contentList.content: Stitched Hide Armor
Fur Bracers
Fur Boots
These boots are warm and comfortable, perfect for long treks in the wilderness.
These bracers provide ample warmth during the winter months.
Sewn together from scraps and animal hide, this armor provides just enough protection from the elements to work.
Draconic-Design Robe
Sorcerer's Hood
Draconic-Design Sleeves
Elaborate Pointed Boots
The designs is meant to invoke the imagery of Dragons.
This hood raises uncomfortable questions - Is the wearer's head in the mouth of a dragon?
Each scale on these bracers represents a distinct direct ancestor.
Golden stitches identify the wearer as high nobility.
Bound Battleaxe
A malleable extraplanar being, shaped into the form of a Battleaxe.
Bound Greataxe
A malleable extraplanar being, shaped into the form of a Greataxe.

A malleable extraplanar being, shaped into the form of a Dagger.

A malleable extraplanar being, shaped into the form of a Warhammer.

A malleable extraplanar being, shaped into the form of a Spear.
